TopicTitle: Hello all you people of the internet

Articles.Content: Hello there, denizens of the web. I have come to announce my joining of this wonderous forum, on which the topic of kerbals and their flying machines may be discussed! Seriously though, I hope I am not too much of a burden or an annoyance. If I am, all you need do is tell me to leave. Thank you for reading this claptrap rambling of an impaired and stupid mind, and may your missions be prosperous.

well, all I can say is, make 4 more posts and you're free as a bird.

Nobody except those who only do destructive negative talk is unwelcome, you are free to enjoy
Oh, a fellow Mad Scientist! I thank you for the kind words of welcome and wish you luck in procuring SCIENCE!

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

skill you need to know 1 : learn to ten char with the white text
skill 2 : learn 10char or better yet hit ......... enough times
Are we talking like ghosts now?
I love how we're just having a discussion on this person's Welcome Aboard thread.

yea we should probably stop...

well more like cult then herd but you get the point

Welcome to the forum!

Friendliest corner of the interwebs.

I think this thread Got derailed.

Edited March 7, 2014 by Dooz

Oh dear, another cult. First Minecraft, then TvTropes, then skimming the edges of the herd, and now this. I don't have enough rams to sacrifice to you all, so I'll make do with some kerbals in Aran skull shaped Lander.

yea we should probably stop...
